resources.string: The classic set of instructions.Tap, swipe, and shake your way to the top!
Make full use of your touch screen using this game mode. Tap and swipe instructions only.
Move, turn, tilt, and twist your device in all kinds of directions. All movement-based instructions are enabled.\n\nBe careful not to drop your device!
This mode will put your dexterity to the test. Swipe instructions only.\n\nHow fast can your fingers go?
Use your keyboard to write words and dial phone numbers as quickly as possible. Type and dial instructions only.\n\nWatch out for typos!
Put your reflexes to the test in this ultimate game mode. All instructions are enabled.\n\How long can you last?
Prefer to take things slow? Start the game with extra time to complete each instruction.
A standard game of Reflex Revolution. Start the game with the regular amount of time to complete each instruction.
Want to get straight into the action? Start the game with less time to complete each instruction.
